title: Introduciton to Programming
description: Fundamental concepts of procedural programming and object-oriented programming. Includes data types, variables, conditional statements, loops, functions, arrays, files, linear data structures like stack, queue and linked list. Teaches in C, C++, C#, Java, Javascript.
subject: Programming

title: Databases
description: Introduction to the relational database model, manipulating data with an interactive query language SQL, database development and design
subject: Databases

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Introduces common algorithms, algorithmic paradigms, and data structures. Teaches skills on algorithmization of problem, analysis and evaluation of algorithms and synthesis of programs based on such algorithms. Students get acquainted with the main groups of algorithms: number processing, sorting, searching, hashing, trees, graphs, recursion, list. The algorithmic solutions are reproduced and analyzed.
subject: Algorithms

title: Object-Oriented Programming
description: Introduces object-oriented concepts such as class, object, methods, method overloading, inheritance, abstraction and polymorphism. Introduces the core concepts behind modern, object-oriented programming and object-oriented design.
subject: Programming

title: Computer Networks
description: Introduction to computer networks, with a special focus on the Internet architecture and protocols. Topics include layered network architectures, addressing, naming, forwarding, routing, communication reliability, the client-server model, web and email protocols.
subject: Computer Science

title: Web Development
description: Web development, technologies for working in a client-server and distributed environment. Provides a foundation in HTML, CSS and CSS frameworks, Javascript, AJAX, DOM, and JS libraries. Web and REST services, as well as applications of XML and JSON in web communication.
subject: Computer Science

title: Data Science
description: Provides a high-level understanding of what data science is, discover key data science trends like data analytics, different data analysis tools, acquire Python programming skills, learn about machine learning and find out the concepts of neural networks. Also exapnd on the topic of statistical theory using Python.
subject: Data Science
